claim: taylor beck be pick 2 place before ryan howse

2. For each player, find their respective "pick" numbers by looking at the relevant rows. In this case, Taylor Beck's pick number is 70 and Ryan Howse's pick number is 74.
3. Compare the pick numbers to determine if one is two places before the other. A number is two places before another when it is strictly less than the other number by exactly 2. In this case, 70 (Taylor Beck's pick number) is not exactly 2 less than 74 (Ryan Howse's pick number), so Taylor Beck is not pick 2 places before Ryan Howse.
